spec:
When running tests in error-quarkus-sample this warning is being raised:
ERROR: The LogManager accessed before the "java.util.logging.manager" system property was set to "org.jboss.logmanager.LogManager". Results may be unexpected.
commitMessage:
Fix LogManager warning in Quarkus tests

- Added junit-platform.properties to set java.util.logging.manager early
- Added test-specific application.properties
- Updated build.gradle.kts to set system property for all test-related tasks
- These changes ensure the LogManager is properly configured before it's accessed
